data.name: SQUIDS - Battle Arena
data.detailed_description:
FEATURES:

100+ weapons with varied abilities
Choose your weapon by collecting powerups containing shields, melee attacks, bombs and traps

Different types of destructible environment (physic based)
Dirt, mud and stone blocks to hide or block enemy bullets.

Rock, paper, scissors based strategic combat
Every weapon reacts differently to other weapons and the environment
data.about_the_game:
FEATURES:

100+ weapons with varied abilities
Choose your weapon by collecting powerups containing shields, melee attacks, bombs and traps

Different types of destructible environment (physic based)
Dirt, mud and stone blocks to hide or block enemy bullets.

Rock, paper, scissors based strategic combat
Every weapon reacts differently to other weapons and the environment
data.short_description: Blast, dodge and survive in fully destructible arenas against 2-4 friends. Collect 100+ power ups with weapons and abilities to shrink your enemies to bits while growing to become the last squid standing!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP2 or later
  • Processor: Intel Haswell 2 cores / 4 threads @ 2.5Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4GB GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP2 or later
  • Processor: Intel Haswell 4 cores / 4 threads @ 3.2Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 550 Ti or equivalent, 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • Storage: 1 GB MB available space
